TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditingContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Contains contextual state information for a designer, such as the . This includes permanent state information, such as the list of services running in the designer. It also includes transient state consisting of context items including the set of currently selected objects as well as the editing tool being used to manipulate objects on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> representa o limite de comunicação que é compartilhado entre o aplicativo de hospedagem e o [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]. O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> era implementado como uma classe concreta para facilidade de uso. Substituir <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> usar gerenciadores de personalizado derivados de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager CreateContextItemManager() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateContextItemManager () As ContextItemManager
abstract member CreateContextItemManager : unit -> System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager override this.CreateContextItemManager : unit -> System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the context item manager that is returned by the property.
Docs.returns: An instance of the context item manager that is returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A implementação padrão cria um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> que dá suporte a atrasada ativação dos gerenciadores de editor de design por meio da declaração de um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> atributo no Gerenciador de design do editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A implementação padrão cria um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> que dá suporte a atrasada ativação dos gerenciadores de editor de design por meio da declaração de um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> atributo no Gerenciador de design do editor.

Docs.param: if this object is being disposed of; if the object is finalizing.
Docs.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by the current object.
Occurs when the method is called or when the object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As ContextItemManager

Docs.summary: Returns the local collection of context items stored by the current editing context.
Docs.value: O coleção de usados neste contexto de edição de objetos.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> coleção é para dados que são compartilhados entre um host e o designer. Esses dados fornecem o mecanismo necessário para conectar-se na assinatura e notificação de alteração.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Services As ServiceManager

Docs.summary: Returns the service manager used in the current editing context.
Docs.value: O usado neste contexto de edição.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> representam a funcionalidade que é fornecido pelo host para usar o designer ou que é usado pelo designer para tornar a funcionalidade disponível para todos os designers dentro do editor.
